tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_performance_reviews ( 
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    employee_id INT NOT NULL, 
    evaluation_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    evaluation_score FLOAT NOT NULL, 
    comments TEXT, 
    improvement_plans TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE evaluations (
    evaluation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID,
    evaluator_id UUID,
    evaluation_date TIMESTAMP,
    score INTEGER,
    feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE improvement_plans (
    plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID,
    plan_description TEXT,
    plan_deadline DATE,
    plan_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE evaluations ( 
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    employee_id INT, 
    reviewer_id INT, 
    evaluation_date DATE, 
    evaluation_score INT 
);

CREATE TABLE comments ( 
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    evaluation_id INT, 
    commenter_id INT, 
    comment_text TEXT, 
    comment_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE improvement_plans ( 
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    employee_id INT, 
    reviewer_id INT, 
    plan_description TEXT, 
    plan_due_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE evaluations (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    evaluator_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    evaluation_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluation_id INT,
    commenter_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE improvement_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluation_id INT,
    assignee_id INT,
    plan_description TEXT,
    plan_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE evaluations (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    reviewer_id INT,
    feedback TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluation_id INT,
    commenter_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE improvement_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluation_id INT,
    employee_id INT,
    plan_description TEXT,
    deadline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    position VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE teams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    team_lead_id INT,
    team_size INT,
    location VARCHAR(255)
);
